events.1668: Mumbai was handed over to East India Company by King of England.
events.1798: England signs treaty with Nizam of Hyderabad, India.
events.1887: Karmveer Bhaurao Paygaunda Patil, educationist, social reformer and founder of  'Rayat Educational Institute', was born.
events.1893: Kashinath Tryambak Telang, first Maharashtrian Chief Justice of Mumbai High Court, died.
events.1896: Bhaktivedanta Swami, litterateur and social worker, was born in Calcutta.
events.1908: Amir Elahi, right-hand batsman and right-arm leg-break bowler, born at Multan in Lahore.
events.1909: Father Kamil Bulke was born. He produced a handy English to Hindi dictionary. He did his Ph.D. on 'Ramcharita Manas' and was Head of Hindi Department in Patna University.
events.1913: Snehangshu Kanta Acharya, politician, social reformer, lawyer and athelete, was born.
events.1915: Rajindersingh Bedi, Urdu story writer and Hindi film story writer, was born.
events.1921: Madhav Krishnaji Mantri, right-hand batsman and wicket-keeper, was born at Nasik, Maharashtra. He was the Indian team selector from 1964 to 1968 and was also the team manager in 1990.
events.1928: Arun Kumar Seal, educationist, was born at Vishnupur.
events.1930: Suhasini Ganguly, freedom fighter, was arrested and send to Hijali Jail for her revolutionery activities. She later lived a low profiled life after release from prision.
events.1934: Suniti Kumar Ghosh, cricket test umpire for two tests from 1988-89, was born in Bengal.
events.1942: Rasbihari Bose established the Indian National Army.
events.1947: Mahatma Gandhi undertakes a fast for unity among Hindus and Muslims. He breaks the fast after 73 hours when peace is restored.
events.1956: Pakistani troops infiltrated the Line of Control in Kashmir.
events.1962: Shivaji University was established in Kolhapur.
events.1965: Pakistan launched Operation 'Grand Slam' in Chhamb sector aimed at Akhnoor in Jammu. Indians had battled Pakistanis in air and on ground at Kashmir.
events.1976: Indira Gandhi asks for sweeping new powers at New Delhi.
events.1977: M. L. Wadhawan was appointed as the Narcotics Commissioner of India. He headed this office till 02-09-1979.
events.1978: Air Chief Marshal Idris Hasan Latif, PVSM, became the Air Officer Commanding, India Command. He was in this office till 31/Aug/1981.
events.1981: Air Chief Marshal Dilbagh Singh PVSM, AVSM, VM., became the Air Officer Commanding, India Command. He was in this office till 03/Sept/1984.
events.1988: Fatte Singrao Gaekwad of Baroda, former Member of Parliament, passed away.
events.1989: Yasser Arafat chosen for the 1988 Jawaharlal Nehru Award for International Understanding.
events.1995: Chandrababu Naidu assumes office as the new CM of Andhra Pradesh.
events.1998: Tatas withdraw their Rs. 1,475-crore proposal to operate an airline with foreign equity participation in the domestic sector.
events.1999: The Congress(I) President, Ms. Sonia Gandhi, launches a broadside against the Vajpayee Government on handling of Kargil issue.
